content: twi-fall pattern by jennifer stover phdaisy1@gmail com originally published december 2012 i enjoy knitting everywhere i go but when it comes to working on projects in the dark keeping it simple is the key this became an accidental surprise during a double movie feature when i realized that my dark-lit attempted ribbed hat did not turn out as intended i liked the final outcome keeping the spiral ribbing for the band and knit a plain stockinette stitch dome after all this is supposed to be mindless dark-room knitting i wanted to minimize the risk of too many mistakes sizes adult small 18 medium 20 large 22 materials  any comfortable light worsted weight yarn  us 7 circular needle &/or dpns to meet gauge 4 x4 = 21sts x 28 row  stitch marker  darning needle for weaving in ends pattern multiples of 4 +1 co 89 97 101 place marker and join in round careful not to twist edge ribbing/base rounds round 1 * k2 p2 * to last stitch k1 round 2 k1 * p2 k2 * size large knit with cascade yarns cherub aran round 3 * p2 k2 * to last stitch p1 round 4 p1 * k2 p2 * repeat rounds 1 - 4 for 2 inches knit stockinette stitch until hat measures 5 75 6 6 5 from the cast on edge decreasing rounds round 1 k2tog knit 8 9 7 k2tog * knit 9 10 8 k2tog * 80 88 90 sts rem round 2 & all even rounds knit round 3 * knit 8 9 7 k2tog * 72 80 80 sts rem round 5 * knit 7 8 6 k2tog * 64 72 70 sts rem round 7 * knit 6 7 5 k2tog * 56 64 60 sts rem round 9 * knit 5 6 4 k2tog * 48 56 50 sts rem round 11 * knit 4 5 3 k2tog * 40 48 40 sts rem round 13 * knit 3 4 2 k2tog * 32 40 30 sts rem round 15 * knit 2 3 1 k2tog * 24 32 20 sts rem round 17 * knit 1 2 0 k2tog * 16 24 10 sts rem stop here for large cut yarn loop through remaining 10 sts 2x pull tight and weave in ends round 19 * knit 0 1 k2tog * 8 16 sts rem stop here for small cut yarn loop through remaining 8 sts 2x pull tight and weave in ends round 21 * k2tog * 8 sts rem stop here for medium cut yarn loop through remaining 8 sts 2x pull tight and weave in ends
